cards.name: 2D Platformer Game
cards.description:
Designed using a clean, object-oriented architecture (entities, physics, rendering, input).
Implemented reusable classes with clear separation of concerns for maintainable code.
Built a JSON-based system for loading textures, levels, and game objects dynamically.
Created an extensible entity framework that allows adding new enemies, items, and mechanics without modifying core systems.

cards.name: Spotify Extra Features App
cards.description:
Added multiple features via the Spotify Web API.
Implemented HTTPS requests for real-time interaction.

cards.name: Bluetooth Controlled Mini Car
cards.description:
Designed & built a DC + servo motor minicar.
Created an Android app using Bluetooth SPP.
Programmed ESP32 to parse packets & control motors.

cards.name: Realtime Chat Application
cards.description:
Built a full-stack realtime chat platform.
Rust backend with scalable architecture.
React + Tailwind UI with live status & message rendering.
WebSockets for instant communication.
